== Changelog ==

= 1.0 =
* Official release

= 0.3 =
* Improves performance.
* Fixes SCSS import.
* Adds warning to output.

= 0.2 =
* Improves security.
* Cleans settings from options after uninstallation.
* Puts "Settings" link on "Plugins" page.

= 0.1 =
* Development release with basic functionalities.
